md:
giải nghĩa từ "units" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Units (noun) - Đơn vị
	+ Meaning: A single, separate, or distinct thing, quantity, or amount.
	+ Example: The company has several units operating in different parts of the country.
	+ Related words: component, element, module, section, department

* Units (noun) - Đơn vị đo lường
	+ Meaning: A standard quantity or amount of something used as a basis for measurement or comparison.
	+ Example: The units of measurement for length are meters and centimeters.
	+ Related words: measurement, scale, standard, quantity, amount

* Units (noun) - Đơn vị quân đội
	+ Meaning: A group of soldiers, vehicles, or equipment that operate together as a team.
	+ Example: The army has several units stationed in the region.
	+ Related words: battalion, brigade, company, platoon, squadron

* Units (verb) - Đơn vị hóa
	+ Meaning: To combine or group things together to form a single unit or entity.
	+ Example: The company units its products into bundles to make them more attractive to customers.
	+ Related words: combine, group, merge, integrate, consolidate
html:
giải nghĩa từ "units" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Units (noun) - Đơn vị

    • Meaning: A single, separate, or distinct thing, quantity, or amount.
    • Example: The company has several units operating in different parts of the country.
    • Related words: component, element, module, section, department

  • Units (noun) - Đơn vị đo lường

    • Meaning: A standard quantity or amount of something used as a basis for measurement or comparison.
    • Example: The units of measurement for length are meters and centimeters.
    • Related words: measurement, scale, standard, quantity, amount

  • Units (noun) - Đơn vị quân đội

    • Meaning: A group of soldiers, vehicles, or equipment that operate together as a team.
    • Example: The army has several units stationed in the region.
    • Related words: battalion, brigade, company, platoon, squadron

  • Units (verb) - Đơn vị hóa

    • Meaning: To combine or group things together to form a single unit or entity.
    • Example: The company units its products into bundles to make them more attractive to customers.
    • Related words: combine, group, merge, integrate, consolidate
